      if (drawer == "rss") {

          $(this).addClass("loading").removeClass(drawer);
          $("#FooterBar-Drawers div.drawer." + drawer).html("<iframe id='rssfeed' src='/rss.aspx' style='border:none;width:100%;height:100%;margin:0px;padding:0px;'></iframe>");
        }
        else {
          OpenDrawer(this, drawer, "30px");
        }
        $("#rssfeed").load(function () {
          OpenDrawer(this, drawer, "30px");
          if (active != "rss") {
            link.addClass(drawer).removeClass("loading");
          }
        });
      }
      if (drawer == "facebook") {
        if ($("#facebookfeed").html() == null) {
          $(this).addClass("loading").removeClass(drawer);
          $("#FooterBar-Drawers div.drawer." + drawer).html("<iframe id='facebookfeed' src='/facebook.aspx' style='border:none;width:100%;height:100%;margin:0px;padding:0px;'></iframe>");

          if (active != "facebook") {
            link.addClass(drawer).removeClass("loading");
          }
        });
      }
      if (drawer == "seotext") {
        OpenDrawer(link, drawer, "30px");
      }
      if (drawer == "ebay") {
        OpenDrawer(link, drawer, "30px");
      }
      if (drawer == "twitter") {

	function CheckActive() {
		var active = $("#FooterBar-Drawers").attr("drawer");

		if (active == "seotext") {
			$("#FooterBar-Wrapper a.ilink.text").addClass("minus").removeClass("plus");
		}
		else {
		  $("#FooterBar-Wrapper a.ilink.text").addClass("plus").removeClass("minus");		  
		}

		return active;
	}

	function OpenDrawer(link, drawer, location) {
		var active = CheckActive();

		if (active == drawer) {
			$("#FooterBar-Drawers").attr("drawer", "none");
			CheckActive();
			//$("#FooterBar-Wrapper a.")
			CloseDrawer(drawer);
			return;
		}
		else if (active != "none") {
			CloseDrawer(active);
			setTimeout(function () {
				$("#FooterBar-Drawers").attr("drawer", drawer);
				CheckActive();
				$("#FooterBar-Drawers div.drawer." + drawer).show();
				$("#FooterBar-Drawers").animate({
					bottom: location
				}, 500, "swing");

			}, 500);
		}
		else {
			$("#FooterBar-Drawers").attr("drawer", drawer);
			CheckActive();
			$("#FooterBar-Drawers div.drawer." + drawer).show();
			$("#FooterBar-Drawers").animate({
				bottom: location
			}, 500, "swing");
		}
	}
	function CloseDrawer(drawer, toopen) {
		$("#FooterBar-Drawers").animate({
			bottom: "-500px"
		}, 500, "swing", function () {
			$("#FooterBar-Drawers .drawer." + drawer).hide();
		});
	}

</script>

        $(this).addClass('ShadowBlurColor');
      }
    });
    $('#ctl00_ucShadowBox_txtPhone').focusin(function() {
      if ($(this).val() === '123-456-7890') {
        $(this).val('');
        $(this).removeClass('ShadowBlurColor');
      }      
    });
    $('#ctl00_ucShadowBox_txtPhone').blur(function() {
      if ($(this).val() === '') {
        $(this).val('123-456-7890');
        $(this).addClass('ShadowBlurColor');
      }
    });
    $('#imgX').click(function() {
      $('#dvShadowBG').hide();
      $('#dvTableBG').hide();

      //Create Cookie for being closed
      createCookie("ShadowClosed",1,1);
    });

    $('#ctl00_ucShadowBox_btnSubmit').click(function () {      
      if (validateEmail($('#ctl00_ucShadowBox_txtEmail').val()) && ($('#ctl00_ucShadowBox_txtEmail').val() != 'youremail@gmail.com'))
      {        
        if ($('#ctl00_ucShadowBox_cbNotify').is(':checked')) {
          cbNotify = 1;
        }
        else {
          cbNotify = 0;
        }

        var lead = {
          Name: $('#ctl00_ucShadowBox_txtName').val(),
          Email: $('#ctl00_ucShadowBox_txtEmail').val(),
          Phone: $('#ctl00_ucShadowBox_txtPhone').val(),
          Comments: $('#ctl00_ucShadowBox_txtComments').val(),
          Notify: cbNotify,
          UserId: '417542'
        };

        $.ajax({
          type: 'POST',
          url: '../Handler/ShadowBox.ashx?action=submit',
          data: JSON.stringify(lead),
          dataType: 'json',
          success: function (data) {
            $('#dvShadowBG').fadeOut(300);
            $('#dvTableBG').fadeOut(300);
          }
        });
      }
      else {
        //Invalid email message
        alert('Please enter a valid email address');
      }
    });
  }
});

function validateEmail(email) { 
  var re = /^(([^<>()[\]\\.,;:\s@\"]+(\.[^<>()[\]\\.,;:\s@\"]+)*)|(\".+\"))@((\[[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\])|(([a-zA-Z\-0-9]+\.)+[a-zA-Z]{2,}))$/;        
  return re.test(email);
} 

function createCookie(name, value, days) {
  if (days) {
    var date = new Date();
    date.setTime(date.getTime() + (days * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000));
    var expires = "; expires=" + date.toGMTString();
  }
  else var expires = "";
  document.cookie = name + "=" + value + expires + "; path=/";
}

function getCookie(c_name) {
  if (document.cookie.length > 0) {
    c_start = document.cookie.indexOf(c_name + "=");
    if (c_start != -1) {
      c_start = c_start + c_name.length + 1;
      c_end = document.cookie.indexOf(";", c_start);
      if (c_end == -1) {
        c_end = document.cookie.length;
      }
      return unescape(document.cookie.substring(c_start, c_end));
    }
  }
  return "";
}
</script>
